title: TOI Publishes Old Flooding Video as Nagpur Airport in Recent Rains
subtitle: Times of India shared a video of rain water being moped off the floor near the check-in counter at Nagpur airport which was an old video and has been republished.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
With the entire country under the spell of the monsoon, social media has been inundated with photographs and videos of the mayhem caused by the rains. One such video is being shared, which is claimed to be of Nagpur airport.

Times of India on its website uploaded a video on 8 July 2018 and reported that the airport has been flooded due to heavy rain. The video shows rainwater being mopped off the floor near the check-in counter.

Social media users on Twitter and Facebook took potshots at the BJP government and Prime Minister Narendra Modi over the state of the airport at Nagpur.
